div.head: I Only Want To Be With You - Dusty Springfield

lg.l: I don't know what it is that makes me love you so.
I only know I never wanna let you go
'cos you started something, can't you see.
That ever since we met you've had a hold on me.
It happens to be true,
I only want to be with you.
It doesn't matter where you go or what you do.
I wanna spend each moment of the day with you.
Look what has happened with just one kiss.
That I never knew that I could be in love like this.
It's crazy but it's true
I only want to be with you.
You stopped and smiled at me,
asked me if I'd care to dance.
